title: delivery.com Integrates with Concur for Easy Corporate Expense Management
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 5:01 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Delivery.com 
NEW YORK, Sept. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- delivery.com today announced the integration of their platform with ConcurÂ®, the leading provider of travel and expense management solutions and services. Now available in the Concur App Center, delivery.com allows corporate clients to enjoy the convenience of e-receipts for meals, alcohol, groceries, laundry, and dry cleaning. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20110721/MM39828LOGO 
The partnership offers a streamlined method of expensing business purchases from such a wide variety of on-demand delivery options. Concur clients can order business meals, including lunch meetings or dinners at their desk; beverages (including alcohol) deliveries for corporate gifts or office happy hours; groceries for the office kitchen; and even laundry and dry cleaning services for extended business trips. An e-receipt is then automatically generated and sent to the users Concur account for effortless expensing. 
For business travelers, the integration offers a modern alternative to room service, giving them a huge selection of local options to choose from. By linking their accounts, users can discover local restaurants and stores, make informed decisions based on reviews and ratings, and place orders for delivery to any hotel room, meeting, or workplace. 
"Partnering with Concur was a natural choice for us," says Jed Kleckner, CEO of delivery.com. "Their clients have an obvious hunger for solutions to the demands of work and travel, and this integration allows them to discover great local merchants in unfamiliar places, order delivery on demand, and manage expenses without missing a beat." 
delivery.com is now available in the Concur App Center. Offering apps with streamlined integration with Concur Travel, Expense and Invoice products, the Concur App Center delivers innovative functionality in key categories such as finance, regulatory compliance, enterprise identity, traveler productivity, travel management and much more. For more information, visit the delivery.com App Center listing: https://www.concur.com/en-us/app-center/listing/nBxxSwU$sMfMLVetjTkeoQHMXCtA/deliverycom 
About delivery.com delivery.com empowers the neighborhood economy by enabling customers to order online from their favorite local restaurants, grocery stores, wine and spirits shops, and laundry and dry cleaning providers. Every day, delivery.com customers explore their communities and order from more than 10,000 local businesses while at home, at work, or on the go. With headquarters in New York and a growing presence throughout the U.S., delivery.com makes e-commerce an integral part of local daily life, helping customers shop, businesses grow, and neighborhoods thrive. delivery.com is a trademark of Delivery.com, LLC.
